Posts.EditableText: It seems this is the key to exploit the power of quest. Can anyone make a suggestion on how to learn the code?
Posts.HTML: It seems this is the key to exploit the power of quest. Can anyone make a suggestion on how to learn the code?

Posts.EditableText: I learnt it buy making games in QDK then studying the code I'd made, to see what the asl looked for everything. I suggest you start their, and look at other people games. You'll also find lots of help [url=http://www.axeuk.com/quest/developer/documentation/asl.htm:13xat325]here[/url:13xat325].
